extendedInfo.description: AWARENESS IS THE KEY TO THE SUCCESS OF ANY MOVEMENT, THIS APP CAME IN ANDROID MARKET TO CREATE AWARENESS IN THE SOCIETY ABOUT THE VARIOUS FACETS OF MEDICAL SERVICES.Welcome to our 1000+ clinic medicine information guide to learn about medicine , drugs , tablets of various disease for all .we have gives best explanation of various medicine with: Important medicine informationUse of MedicineAttention : Keep in mindEffect of MedicineWe provide advance search facility to quick find medicine. we only install this app  clinic medicine once and learn about medicine of ill . we understand the need of doctor, specialist to remember about various top medicine in today life but with our helpful medicine guide we can easily know meaning of medicine with more information. It help to medical student to clear all exam and clear interview. 1000 medicine pocket guide  is a perfect as a quick reference on the wards or in a busy clinic, this is pocket guide to offer disease essentials in a one-disease-per-page.We are providing this app  to give only information if you want to apply on a subject first concert to the doctor.
